scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists chiefly of sermons by Stocker arranged according to the church year.

The collection also contains some religious and travel articles by him, including articles for The Moravian; his book reviews of Harry Emerson Fosdick's Adventurous Religionand Samuel M. Shoemaker's Children of the Second Birth; and "A Short History of the International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons 1886-1924" by Clara Morehouse.
